# Libraries

```{r}
suppressPackageStartupMessages({
library(tidyverse)
library(gprofiler2)
})
```

# Directories

```{r}
result.dir <- "2024_04_23_results/"

if(!exists(result.dir)){
  dir.create(result.dir)
}

```

# Read in data and filter only significant genes

```{r}
mix4.vs.all.4 <- read.csv(file = "2024_01_18_results/DESeq_results/mix.4.VS.all.4.csv") |> 
  filter(padj <= 0.05)

mix4.vs.auto.4 <- read.csv(file = "2024_01_10_results/deseq_results/Mixed.CD4.D.vs.Auto.CD4.D.csv") |> 
  filter(padj <= 0.05)
```


```{r}
temp <- mix4.vs.auto.4$gene_symbol
  
temp2 <- gost(temp,
             organism = "mmusculus",
             ordered_query = T,
             evcodes = T,
             custom_bg = NULL,
             sources = c("GO", "KEGG", "REAC"))
  
```


```{r}
unique(temp)
```
